title: Vaccine Workshop - Eastside Natural Medicine
description: This workshop is designed to help parents (and others in the birth community) make educated decisions on whether or not to vaccinate their family. This is a comprehensive overview of vaccines offered in WA state....
cleaned_text: Apr 23 This workshop is designed to help parents (and others in the birth community) make educated decisions on whether or not to vaccinate their family. This is a comprehensive overview of vaccines offered in WA state. Topics covered: Timing of vaccinations, risks & benefits, history of vaccines and laws regarding school aged children who are not vaccinated. For Dr Sunita's bio, please
